articles.author: Ruairidh Barlow
articles.title: Pep Guardiola declares ‘very big problem’ ahead of second leg with Real Madrid - Football Espana
articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has manifested his concern about the fitness of his side ahead of their second leg against Real Madrid in the Champions League. As the reigning champions face Luton Town on Saturday, the logic would suggest that City woul…
